input.sentences: three women pose for a photo at the dinner party .
a different group of people at the dinner party pose for a picture together .
four people of all ages group together for a photo opportunity .
there are many patrons at the dinner and it is a fancy occasion .
the table setting is perfect and there are decorations all around .
output.sentences: The women at the benefit dinner were more than ready to pose for a photo.
One man wanted to pose in a photo as well, so I suppose I should say people.
If fact, anytime I went to take a photo plenty of people jumped in on the oppertunity.
The patrons were all happy that they joined this occasion, and everyone dressed in their fancy clothes.
I was impressed by the table setting, and in fact I found it perfect.
